english.segment1: Walking down Broadway. I saw a mom and her baby. She came up to me. And asked me for a dime. I said naw come on. I'll take you to this diner. Gave her more than food. It came to $6.05
english.segment2: People don't need just money, people need love and time. Spent a little time with the hurting honey and got myself love-a-fied
english.segment3: CHORUS. Blowin' kises to the one I love. Blowin' kisses to the Father above. Helpin' others to feel His touch. Blowin' kisses to the one I love
english.segment4: Well, she said their names. Were Rachel, Lil, Nikki. I said, "Hey, that's strange". 'Cause Nikki's my name too. As she turned to go. She spoke to me words of blessing. With an angel's voice, she said. "I see the Christ in you"
